art.author: a_believer
art.post: I read the book of Colton’s experiences and I’m a firm believer of God, the son and the holy spirit.  I looked at Akiane’s picture out of curiosity.  I don’t dispute what she or Colton saw when in heaven.  My question is did Jesus have any color in skin?  Jesus is always depicted as a white man.  Given the region where he was born, lived,traveled and died, is there a possibility that he was not white?
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
